resources.string: Select true if you wish to be invincible
Checking will reset game and lose all progress when you die.
When true, dropped items details will appear on screen when collided with
Oh! Thank heavens I ran into you, son of Elrod. You may be our only hope in surviving the corruption that has plagued Traeldor! Let\'s start by taking care of those pesky Elves in the Plains...
You will never make it out of the Traeldor Plains alive! I\'ll be sure of that.
We will meet again, slime; count on it!
That Zaul is an impetuous and stubborn creature. I knew I had made the right decision in choosing you for this quest.
You will need to pass through the Mines of Balron in order to reach the Troll\'s Den. I am uncertain of the state of those mines, so be weary, be sure to upgrade your stats and spells.
Oh my! Young knight, prepare for a messy battle... The Troll King awaits your arrival
Wow... You are more skilled than I ever would have imagined. Those trolls are no walk in the park. Keep it up; almost there!
Now this is just strange; these suits seem to be from another planet, much more advanced than I\'ve ever seen...
I am not going to take it so easy on you this time!
You will burn for this young Knight!
Greetings young Knight, and welcome to the Traeldor Plains! The corruption in the land grows stronger each day. Slay 10 monsters without dying and ye\'ll be granted with an additional 20 base hp.
Greetings young Knight, and welcome to the Traeldor Plains! The corruption in the land grows stronger each day. Slay 15 monsters without dying and ye\'ll be granted with an additional 20 base hp.
Greetings young Knight, and welcome to the Traeldor Plains! The corruption in the land grows stronger each day. Slay 20 monsters without dying and ye\'ll be granted with an additional 20 base hp.
Very well done back there! Now, you must slay 15 monsters without dying and 5 dexterity points will be yours. Dexterity increases your attack speed.
Very well done back there! Now, you must slay 20 monsters without dying and 5 dexterity points will be yours. Dexterity increases your attack speed.
Very well done back there! Now, you must slay 25 monsters without dying and 5 dexterity points will be yours. Dexterity increases your attack speed.
This will test your battle skills young Knight. Slay 20 monsters without dying and you will be granted 5 strength points. Strength increases your damage output
This will test your battle skills young Knight. Slay 25 monsters without dying and you will be granted 5 strength points. Strength increases your damage output
This will test your battle skills young Knight. Slay 30 monsters without dying and you will be granted 5 strength points. Strength increases your damage output
